Package animals

Class Animal

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
mobility.Mobile
animals.Animal
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEdible, IAnimalBehavior, IDrawable, Cloneable, Runnable, Ilocatable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Chewing, Roaring
public abstract class Animal extends Mobile implements IEdible, IDrawable, IAnimalBehavior, Runnable, Cloneable
Abstract class who representing an Animal
Version:
3.0 18 May 2022
Author:
Stav Sharabi

      Parameters:
      name - - name of the animal
      p - - point of the animal location
      size - - size of the animal(measured with pixels)
      horSpeed - - horizontal speed of the animal
      verSpeed - - vertical speed of the animal
      col - - color of the animal
